detectors.description:
CPS.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#45-62) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[to] + tokens >= balanceOf[to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#51)
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#54)
	- balanceOf[to] += tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#56)
detectors.markdown:
[CPS.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#L45-L62) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [require(bool)(balanceOf[to] + tokens >= balanceOf[to])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#L51)
	- [balanceOf[msg.sender] -= tokens](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#L54)
	- [balanceOf[to] += tokens](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#L56)

detectors.description:
CPS.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#64-83) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[to] + tokens >= balanceOf[to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#72)
	- balanceOf[from] -= tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#75)
	- balanceOf[to] += tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#77)

detectors.description:
CPS.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#36-43) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 200000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:
[CPS.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#L36-L43) uses literals with too many digits:

detectors.description:
transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#14)
	- CPS.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#45-62)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#16)
	- CPS.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#64-83)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#18)
	- CPS.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#85-91)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#20)
	- CPS.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CPS.sol#93-95)
